Package dev.mikita.sh.entity.device

Class ADevice

java.lang.Object
dev.mikita.sh.entity.device.ADevice
All Implemented Interfaces:
IEventSource, ITimeTracker, IUsableObject
Direct Known Subclasses:
AirConditioner, Fridge, Heater, Light, Microwave, Oven, TV, WashingMachine
public abstract class ADevice extends Object implements ITimeTracker, IEventSource, IUsableObject
Abstract class representing device.
